title: HackAPrompt: Unleashing the Power of Global Scale Prompt Hacking Competition
summary: Join our groundbreaking challenge to expose systemic vulnerabilities in Large Language Models (LLMs) and unlock their full potential!
intro: Imagine a world where AI language models are no longer constrained by rigid instructions, but instead, they can be molded and shaped by your creativity and ingenuity! Welcome to HackAPrompt, the ultimate global scale prompt hacking competition.
text: In this article, we delve into the fascinating realm of prompt hacking, a heretofore underexplored aspect of Large Language Models (LLMs). By leveraging a massive dataset of adversarial prompts, we demonstrate the susceptibility of these models to manipulation through creative input attacks. Our findings have far-reaching implications for the future of AI research and development, as well as the potential for novel applications and use cases. Join us on this exciting journey and discover the limitless possibilities of HackAPrompt!
prompt: Design a futuristic cyberpunk magazine cover featuring a sleek, high-tech cityscape with neon lights and a dominant color scheme of purple and black. Include a banner headline that reads 'HackAPrompt: Unleashing the Power of Global Scale Prompt Hacking Competition' and a tagline such as 'Exposing Systemic Vulnerabilities of LLMs through a Revolutionary Challenge'. The image should convey a sense of excitement, innovation, and boundary-pushing.
creator: Sander Schulhoff, Jeremy Pinto, Anaum Khan, Louis-François Bouchard, Chenglei Si, Svetlina Anati, Valen Tagliabue, Anson Liu Kost, Christopher Carnahan, Jordan Boyd-Graber
